body.name: Granitestone Green Frying Pan with Ultra Nonstick Durable Mineral & Diamond Coating, Skillet with Stainless Steel Stay Cool Handle, Oven & Dishwasher Safe, 100% PFOA Free, 12""" (7383)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 8 mins
features: HEALTHY & NON-TOXIC – the Granitestone coating is derived from minerals and reinforced with diamonds, making this frying pan free of PFOA, PFOS, lead & cadmium for an eco-friendly, healthy experience.

ULTRA NON-STICK – the Granite Stone Emerald Collection nonstick cooking surface is coated 3x, reinforced with diamonds to deliver the ultimate food release. No oil or butter needed, makes for healthier eating, and provides for hassle free, 1-2-3 cleanup.

GRANITESTONE EMERALD COLLECTION – New for 2021, the Granitestone Emerald collection was inspired by the natural and healthy elements of this pan and will make a stylish statement in any kitchen with performance upgrades including improved nonstick and durability.

SUPER DURABLE – the coating of the pan is infused with diamonds, the strongest material on earth which makes it durable enough to withstand metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks and even electric beaters while delivering years of outstanding, nonstick use.
EFFORTLESS CLEANUP, DISHWASHER SAFE– spend less time with cleanup! After all the cooking and prepping is done, place cookware in the dishwasher for quick and easy cleanup.
STOVETOP & OVEN SAFE - compatible with gas, electric, glass cooktops & oven safe up to a sizzling up to 500° Fahrenheit
STAY COOL HANDLES – the stainless-steel handles are ergonomically designed for both righty and lefties & the unique Y shaped handles let’s heat escape and keeps the handles cool to the touch.
EVEN HEAT DISTRIBUTION – stamped from a solid sheet of aluminum ensures even heat distribution all around with no dead zones or hot spots.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra Nonstick. Coated three times with our mineral coating for the ultimate nonstick experience – without oil and butter. Food glides around on the pan and nothing sticks, even after years of use. 100% PFOA Free. The healthy mineral nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium, so it will never release toxic fumes, even if it’s accidentally overheated. Cool Touch Handles. Handles are design to be cool to the touch with our exclusive Y shaped design, shedding heat quickly and are ergonomically designed. Dishwasher Safe. Allows for an easy cleanup. Simply wipe down and throw in the dishwasher for the super quick experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It came in the wrong size
reviews.reviewText: The pan is great. I actually ordered two. One 10 inch that I received a week ago. This one came yesterday. It was supposed to be a 12 inch pan. I will keep it rather than go through the return of it. Just wanted you to know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A1 Value 4 $ Spent ...
reviews.reviewText: Waited a few months prior to scribbling out some hasty words so I cvould give a more accurate overall review in every aspect of this 12" pan. Thru the years I've used the pricey and the cheap of many different brands - none (that's a big zero) have ever made it beyond 2 years of more than the once a week usage. AND so far after I'd say 50 uses this ones hanging there without issue other than the duller appearance of the 'green' inlay. The main thing is - heat has NOT bowed the base as of yet which most others do start showin' a slight crown by now. Still nothing has ever stuck - Still ez to wipe out - Still ez to final clean in the sink. NO issues as of yet thou its gotta long ways to go to get to that 2 year stage in life SO lets just say its Still kind of a pre-mature review thou cant drop stars due to that since its been a great buy so far - only time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: We have had our share of other "non-stick" pans, like calphalon (horrible). This one is truly a non-stick surface. After being burned by other cookware, I decided to only buy one pan to trial run before buying the full set. Bought this pan, used it daily for over a month, It is amazing how well it cooks. Smoked chops, hash browns, and anything else you want to cook will come out just like you want. I have also been washing it in the dishwasher, only need to wipe off minor water spots. So I finally bought the full set andI am very pleased with them. Far superior to pans that cost 3 to 4 times as much! Don't waste your money on others, these are the real deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is good product
reviews.reviewText: Have not had very long but definitely happy with It

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is the best frying pan I have ever had. Cooks food evenly and quickly. So easy to cleanIt is very light weight. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it l just love it
reviews.reviewText: I love it because you can clean it with a paper towel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This skillet is awesome. I went from being a straight cast iron girl to a granitestone lover!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Metal utensils Ok, I call BS
reviews.reviewText: Have had the thing for 2 weeks and used a metal spatula to flip burgers and it's already scratched. Very Disappointed since the 14" we own has been used with metal items many times and is not scratched. This one probably made in China! Would recommend using plastic or wood utensils in this one. One other thing I noticed is that it is starting to warp on the bottom so it wobbles while on the glasstop stove. Just can't believe it went to sh17 so quick. going to try to replace it.My second package arrived and I was expecting EXACTLY what was on the box...but NO, not the same. Handles are way different was expecting the round stay cool handles like the box AND product said, and got the flat handles that get hot, WTF is going on, does anyone do a quality check anymore.
